tier.item: `My grandfather, (he) will clean the mature coconuts, (and) cut them open,
and, our helpers in the house, they will grate them ...'
`My grandfather, (he) will clean the mature coconuts, (and) cut them open,
and, our helpers in the house, they will grate them ...'

(33) a. Binye-ne ning babai ing libro king anak.
